MAIN.title: Are you looking to get some assistance with your appliance repair?
MAIN.subtitle: Our team of qualified Technicians is ready to fix your appliance
MAIN.price_subtitle: No service call charge with a repair
MAIN.how_it_works_item1_text: Select the day and time for your service and describe the issue.
MAIN.how_it_works_item2_text: Our experienced and fully-equipped Pro will come and estimate the issue.
MAIN.how_it_works_item3_text: Once the Pro completes the work you pay for service and get our Guarantee.
